_sText: This map is a tropical island, is has two entrances to the base 1. In the the little hut in middle of the island. 2. The secret underwater entrance. Once your in you will have to go up a lift then though a body scan and a high-tec security system before entering (including lasers) Once your past those in the first room you come to there will be a fireable nucealar rocket :) Go thought this room and you will come to the main room in here you will find: Singing zombies, a huge monitor showing the island, table and kitchen. There is also a tortue chamber and a garage in this base. Becuase of all this cool stuff it may lag a little and shouldn't be attempted with a machine equal or greater than: 2.8GHZ proccessor, 512RAM, ATI RADEON 9200 Update : New Zip file with a smaller size. re-download
